name: Town With No Name HD Remake: Crash Less Edition
name_original: Town With No Name HD Remake: Crash Less Edition
description:
InComplete Unity Remake of The Town With No Name featuring new first person mechanics, a fully explorable 3D town, cutscenes, secrets, and hardcore cowboy action.

Experience life at its most vivid in The Town With No Name.

UPDATE LOG:

VER 0.1984 - 3/14/2023

  • Guaranteed to not intentionally crash your computer anymore
  • Sounds fixed: no longer max volume at all times, now more spatially correct and appropriately loud

EXPECT MORE UPDATES TO COME

IT'S GOING TO GET A LOT WORSE

CONTROLS:

WASD: LOCOMOTE

SPACE: GUNNYHOP

F: MANIPULATE

LEFT CLICK: SPAWN PROJECTILE

R: OPEN CYLINDER AND INSERT CARTRIDGES
